docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 27--James F. Byrnes, Secretary of State, announced today the "unqualified adherence" by the United States Government to the principles of collective intervention in the Western Hemisphere submitted to the American Republics last week...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 27--James F. Byrnes, Secretary of State, announced today the "unqualified adherence" by the United States Government to the principles of collective intervention in the Western Hemisphere submitted to the American Republics last week by Uruguay.

docs.snippet: LONDON, Nov. 27--The Soviet Union implied today an intention of rejecting the idea of modifying the Big Five veto power as the United Nations Preparatory Commission, still moving with a remarkable degree of unanimity, constituted its eight technical...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 27--The Soviet Union implied today an intention of rejecting the idea of modifying the Big Five veto power as the United Nations Preparatory Commission, still moving with a remarkable degree of unanimity, constituted its eight technical committees and elected their chairmen.

docs.snippet: The State Department's warning that it "disapproves of and opposes most strongly any interference or participation by American business men or companies in the local political affairs of the other American republics" is a reminder, not a change of...
docs.lead_paragraph: The State Department's warning that it "disapproves of and opposes most strongly any interference or participation by American business men or companies in the local political affairs of the other American republics" is a reminder, not a change of policy. It would not be hard to find past instances in which there was interference.
